dmca.title: Windows XP 2001
dmca.body:
Good morning.

We are writing to you regarding your Windows XP 2001 Expert Zone community page located at the following address: http://www.msnusers.com/windowsxp2001/xphome.msnw .  We are happy to see that you support Microsoft and Windows XP, Windows XP is a great product and we are glad to see that you agree.  Microsoft has worked very hard to develop and market a first rate operating system for our customers.  

 

We noticed that your use of certain Microsoft logos and trademarks on this web site may confuse customers.  In particular your use of the titles, ?Windows XP Expert Zone,? ?Windows XP Expert? and your use of the Windows XP and Microsoft logos may cause customers to think that your site and services are officially sponsored or endorsed by Microsoft.  Although the disclaimer that appears on your web site states that, ?Microsoft has no responsibility for the content featured in this Web Community,? this does not adequately eliminate the potential for confusion. 

 

We would like to assist you in properly identifying the services offered at your web site since we value your support.  Please feel free to send me email or call me at [phone] with a time that is convenient for you to talk.  If you prefer to receive more detailed comments in email, please let me know.  Thank you.

 

Sincerely,

[Private]

Senior Trademark Paralegal

Microsoft Corporation
